aboutUsScreen.subscribeText: By subscribing to our newsletter you will receive updates to help you stay informed on the latest charity drives and ways to help families in need.

onboardingScreen.paragraph1: Every Saturday, we organize charity drives to help those in need!
onboardingScreen.paragraph2: The Obrok za porodicu 3M ("Meal for the Family 3M") mission statement is its very name: every family's right to a meal.
onboardingScreen.paragraph3: You may also contribute by donating clothing you no longer wear!
onboardingScreen.paragraph4: This app provides an overview of charity drives led by our organization, which you can participate in yourself!
